title: #118: An Island Of Truth In A Sea Of Lies
description:
We have been calling out their lies for a very long time now. It isn’t too hard to do because they aren’t very creative when it comes to their deception.

As we transition into a “post-fact world”, the stakes have never been higher and critical thinking is paramount for our survival. Identifying the lies earlier than others may be the difference between life or death. Recognizing where things are headed and you will avoid the pitfalls that others fall into.

Can we avoid the dystopian nightmare that those in positions of power are seeking to bring about, or will we rise up and put an end to the insanity before it becomes permanent? Only time will tell.
